articles.title: National Memorial Service for Kim Jong Il Held
articles.content:
National Memorial Service for Kim Jong Il Held
 Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- A national memorial service for leader Kim Jong Il took place at the plaza of the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun in a solemn atmosphere on Saturday, the fifth anniversary of his demise.
					 Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, took the tribune of honor of the memorial service.
					
					 Present there were Kim Yong Nam, Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae and other senior party, state and army officials, members of the party central leadership organ in Pyongyang and officials of party, armed forces and power organs, public organizations, ministries and national institutions, men and officers of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, and officials of institutions, industrial establishments and farms in Pyongyang, persons who are related to the revolutionary activities of Kim Jong Il, persons who had the honor of being received by him, those of merits, bereaved families of revolutionary martyrs, delegations of overseas Koreans, compatriots and the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					 Participating in the memorial service were diplomatic envoys of different countries and representatives of international organizations here and members of the military attaches corps of foreign embassies here and other foreign guests.
					
					 All the participants paid silent tribute in humblest reverence to Kim Jong Il, image and eternal leader of the great Paektusan nation.
					
					 Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee, vice-chairman of the DPRK State Affairs Commission and vice-chairman of the WPK Central Committee, delivered a memorial address.
					
					 He said:
					
					 The revolutionary life of leader Kim Jong Il was the most patriotic life of total dedication as he devoted his all to the work to carry forward to completion the Juche revolution and achieve the prosperity of the great Paektusan nation, hewing the untrodden arduous path under the uplifted red flag of the revolution, true to the noble intention of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 With intense loyalty to the President, Kim Jong Il had worked heart and soul to realize the President's idea and cause in all fields.
					
					 He formulated the revolutionary idea of the President as Kimilsungism and established his monolithic ideological and leadership system in the whole party and society and firmly protected the revolutionary traditions of Juche and glorified the party, the state and the army as the party, state and army of the President.
					
					 He implanted into the hearts of the servicepersons and people of the whole country the mainstay of faith that the President is always with us and saw to it that the Kumsusan Memorial Palace was consecrated to the sacred temple of Juche and the history of the President is given steady continuity on this land.
					
					 He developed the People's Army into the matchless powerful revolutionary Paektusan army capable of beating back any formidable enemy at one blow and put the national defence industry on a self-reliant and ultra-modern basis, making the country shine as a world military power and full-fledged nuclear weapons state.
					
					 Thanks to him, the June 15 era of reunification advancing in the idea of By Our Nation Itself was ushered in and a rosy prospect was opened for the Korean nation's independent reunification and peace and prosperity. 
					
					 He energetically conducted external activities with his distinguished diplomatic strategy, remarkably enhancing the international position of the DPRK and its influence and expanding its foreign relations, and made undying contributions to protecting the world peace and security and accomplishing the human cause of independence.
					
					 With his far-sighted wisdom, he perfectly solved the issue of succession to the revolutionary cause in keeping with the requirement of the times and the aspiration of the people.
					
					 The revolutionary career and great exploits of Kim Jong Il, who laid the firm foundation for the eternal victory of the great Paektusan nation and the prosperity of the country in which the Korean people can enjoy wellbeing generation after generation, will shine for all ages along with Kim Jong Un's era, Choe Ryong Hae stressed.
					
					 Then, pledge-taking speeches were made at the service by Kim Ki Nam, member of the Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee, member of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and vice-chairman of the WPK Central Committee, on behalf of the WPK, Vice Marshal of the Korean People's Army Hwang Pyong So, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee, vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and director of the KPA General Political Bureau, on behalf of the KPA, and Jon Yong Nam, first secretary of the Central Committee of the Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist Youth League, on behalf of the youth.
					
					 The speakers said that all the servicepersons and people of the DPRK pay the highest tribute and extend the best wishes for immortality to Kim Jong Il, with their ardent yearning for him.
					
					 They recalled that Kim Jong Il had worked heart and soul till the last moments of his life to provide a solid foundation for the strengthening of the Party, the prosperity of the country and the happiness of its people and bring rosy future of the Juche revolution.
					
					 They stressed that his exploits for the Party and the revolution, the country and its people would remain for all ages as the bloodline of our Party and the banner of struggle promoting the cause of the Juche revolution.
					
					 They called for holding Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the eternal sun of Juche and remaining intensely loyal to the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 There boomed a salute of minute guns in memory of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Meanwhile, similar memorial services and meetings were held in all provinces, cities, counties and complexes of the country on the same day.

articles.title: Senior Officials of DPRK Pay High Tribute to Kim Jong Il at Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Senior Officials of DPRK Pay High Tribute to Kim Jong Il at Kumsusan Palace of Sun
 Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- Senior party, state and army officials of the DPRK visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Saturday, the nation's greatest memorial day, to pay high tribute to leader Kim Jong Il on the fifth anniversary of his demise.
					 Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), the state and the army, visited the Palace at 09:00.
					
					 He entered the hall where the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il are standing. 
					
					 The chief of a guard of honor of the Ground, Naval, Air and Anti-Air Forces of the Korean People's Army and the Worker-Peasant Red Guards made a salute towards the statues.
					
					 A floral basket in the name of Kim Jong Un was placed at the statues.
					
					 Also laid were floral baskets in the joint name of the Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the WPK, the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly and the Cabinet of the DPRK.
					
					 Kim Jong Un together with the participants paid high tribute to the statues.
					
					 Then he entered the hall where Kim Jong Il lies in state. 
					
					 He, together with the participants, paid deep homage and made bow to Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The participants went round the hall where orders Kim Jong Il received are on display.
					
					 Accompanying the supreme leader were Kim Yong Nam, Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae and other senior party, state and army officials and members of the party central leadership organ in Pyongyang, officials of the party and armed forces organs, ministries and national institutions.

articles.title: Musical Epic "Songun March of General" Performed
articles.content:
Musical Epic "Songun March of General" Performed
 Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- A performance of musical epic "Songun March of General" was given at the Ponghwa Art Theatre on Saturday, the fifth anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Among the audience were Kim Yong Nam, Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju and Choe Ryong Hae, members of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, and other senior party, state and army officials, the chairman of a friendly party, members of the party central leadership organ in Pyongyang and officials of party and armed forces organs, ministries and national institutions, officials of institutions, factories and enterprises, persons of merits in Pyongyang.
					
					 Invited to the performance were overseas Koreans delegations, compatriots, those related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front, diplomatic envoys of different countries and representatives of international organizations here and military attaches of foreign embassies and their wives and foreigners.
					
					 The number of the performance, which began with narration and music "General, Please Receive Our Reports", included chorus "Memory of Road to Front", female solo and male pangchang "Tell, O Road of Songun" and children's chorus "General and Children".
					
					 The performers sang loudly of the revolutionary exploits of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The performance vividly represented the devoted efforts of Kim Jong Il who had made a long journey of Songun without letup.
					
					 It also showed the feelings of the army and people grateful to Kim Jong Il and their fixed will to win the final victory of the Juche revolution under the guidance of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: All Korean People Pay Silent Tribute to Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
All Korean People Pay Silent Tribute to Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- Korea is wrapped in the solemnest atmosphere today, the fifth anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The national flags of the DPRK are hung at half-mast in the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun where President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il lie in state, the organs of the Party, armed forces, power, social organizations, ministries and national institutions, units of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, scientific, educational, literary and art, public health and media institutions, industrial establishments, farms and fishing villages of the country.
					
					 At noon, sirens blared at cities, towns, countryside and factories and all running engines and sailing ships gave whistles simultaneously.
					
					 All party members, service personnel and civilians simultaneously paid silent tribute towards the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun, the sacred temple of Juche, for three minutes.

articles.title: DPRK People Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
DPRK People Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
 Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- Servicepersons and working citizens of the DPRK visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Saturday, the nation's greatest memorial day, to pay high tribute to leader Kim Jong Il.
					 They entered the hall where the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il are standing.
					
					 Seen standing before the statues was a floral basket in the name of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also there were floral baskets in the joint name of the Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea, the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly and the Cabinet of the DPRK.
					
					 The visitors paid tribute to the statues of the great leaders.
					
					 At the hall where Kim Jong Il lies in state, they made deep bows to him.
					
					 They went round a hall where orders he received are on display and halls which house a car, electric car, boat and train coach he had used for his field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of his life.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- The people in the DPRK laid floral baskets, bouquets and flowers at the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and the mosaics depicting their smiling images across the country on the 5th anniversary of Kim Jong Il's demise.
					 In the capital city of Pyongyang, servicepersons, working citizens from all walks of life and school youth and children visited the statues of the great leaders on Mansu Hill.
					
					 Seen there was a floral basket from supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Placed at the statues were floral baskets in the names of party, armed forces and power bodies, social organizations, ministries, national institutions, units of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, and institutions, industrial establishments and schools at all levels in Pyongyang.
					
					 A floral basket in the name of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front was laid at the statues.
					
					 The visitors made bows to the statues.
					
					 Meanwhile, floral baskets, bouquets and flowers were placed at the statues of the great leaders and the portraits of their smiling images in different parts of Pyongyang, including Kim Il Sung University, the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, the Ministry of People's Security and the Mansudae Art Studio.
					
					 Servicepersons, working people and school youth and children across the country paid tribute to the statues of the great leaders and their portraits in their residential areas.

articles.title: DPRK's Army and People Honor Memory of Kim Jong Il in Humblest Reverence
articles.content:
DPRK's Army and People Honor Memory of Kim Jong Il in Humblest Reverence
 Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- The army and people of the DPRK honored the memory of leader Kim Jong Il who dedicated his whole life to the party and revolution, the country and its people in the humblest reverence on the occasion of the 5th anniversary of his demise.
					 The service personnel, people of various circles and school youth and children entered the plaza of the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun, the sacred temple of Juche, on the greatest memorial day of the nation and paid tribute to the portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Service personnel, people of various circles and school youth and children visited the statues of the great leaders in various parts of the country to pay tribute to them.
					
					 Remembrance concerts were given by artistes, youth and students and members of the women's union in South Phyongan, North Hamgyong, South Hamgyong and Ryanggang provinces and Kaesong City.
					
					 Performers highly praised the revolutionary history and exploits of Kim Jong Il who made long journeys for dedication to the country and its people till the last moments of his great life.
					
					 Remembrance meetings of youth and students, and those persons who had the honor of being received by Kim Jong Il and persons related to his revolutionary activities took place in various parts of the country.
					
					 Working people's organizations across the country held oath-taking meetings.

articles.title: Foreigners and Overseas Koreans Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Foreigners and Overseas Koreans Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
 Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- Foreigners and overseas Koreans visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Saturday to pay tribute to leader Kim Jong Il on the fifth anniversary of his demise.
					 They included foreign diplomatic envoys and representatives of the missions of international organizations here, military attaches of foreign embassies and a memorial delegation of Koreans in Japan and a delegation of the General Association of Koreans in China.
					
					 At the hall where statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il stand, the visitors paid high tribute to the great leaders.
					
					 And they made bows to Kim Jong Il at the hall where he lies in state.
					
					 They went round the hall where orders he received are on display and the halls that house a car, electric car, boat and train coach used by him for field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of his life. 
					
					 On the same day, the chief and members of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun to pay homage to him.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Message from C.C., AINDF
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Message from C.C., AINDF
 Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a message from the Central Committee of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front on Saturday, the 5th anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The message said that the past five years since the Korean people bitterly grieved over the sudden loss of the sun of all people, the father of the nation whom they trusted and followed like Heaven were a sacred period in which they deeply grasped the noble personality of General Kim Jong Il as a great man and his immortal exploits and a stirring period in which they greeted a bright new era in the cause of immortalizing the great leaders under the guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The noble image and patriotic devotion of the peerless patriot, who reliably defended socialism centered on the popular masses and turned the DPRK into an invincible politico-ideological power and a world military power with his invincible Songun politics, are shining brilliantly in the history of the motherland and the nation.
					
					 His idea and cause are now being steadfastly carried forward by you and the history of the great Generalissimos as the sun is given steady continuity generation after generation, startling the world people.
					
					 On the high rostrum of the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea you clarified the great Generalissimos' Juche-based line of reunification as the WPK's line for national reunification and showed a new path and strategy for accomplishing the cause of reunification strictly on the basis of the three charters for national reunification set forth by them. This is an event to be specially recorded in the history of the nation as it instilled courage and confidence in the future of reunified powerful nation into all the compatriots.
					
					 The Korean nation's struggle for independence, democracy and reunification is sure to triumph as the great Generalissimos are always alive as the sun of Juche and you show the road ahead of the fellow countrymen with bright rays of Songun, the message said.

articles.title: Letter to Kim Jong Un from Chongryon Central Standing Committee
articles.content:
Letter to Kim Jong Un from Chongryon Central Standing Committee
 Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a letter from the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) on Saturday, the 5th anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The letter said that Kim Jong Il was a prominent leader and peerless patriot who had wisely led the party, the army and the people with his outstanding and tested leadership to bring about a great heyday in all fields of the revolution and construction and turned the country into a single-mindedly united political and ideological power and an invincible military power and thus put the dignity and might of the great Paektusan nation on the highest level in the nation's history. 
					
					 He was the lodestar of national reunification who led all the fellow countrymen along the road of independent reunification and peace and prosperity with his noble patriotism and a veteran statesman in the world who made undying contributions to the human cause of independence, the letter noted.
					
					 It praised him as a distinguished leader and a guardian of the destiny of Chongryon and the Korean residents in Japan as he developed Chongryon into a pace-setter in the patriotic movement, a model of patriotism and loyalty and an exemplary overseas Koreans' organization.
					
					 The past five years were a glorious period in which the Koreans in Japan deeply enshrined the truth that his revolutionary idea and exploits will shine forever and the final victory of the movement of Koreans in Japan is certain along with the Juche cause as long as they are led by Kim Jong Un, it said.
					
					 The letter stressed that they would bring earlier a new heyday of the movement of Koreans in Japan by thoroughly implementing the important teachings and instructions of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Letter to Kim Jong Un from General Association of Koreans in China
articles.content:
Letter to Kim Jong Un from General Association of Koreans in China
 Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a letter from the General Association of Koreans in China Saturday, the 5th anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The letter said that for the past five years since the nation wriggled in agony over the sudden demise of the fatherly General, the Korean residents in China had keenly realized once again what great and kind-hearted man the Korean nation held in high esteem as its leader and father in its life and struggle and they had deeply enshrined the immutable truth that as long as there is Marshal Kim Jong Un, President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il are always alive in the hearts of the overseas Koreans and humankind.
					
					 Kim Jong Il performed immortal and great feats on behalf of the country and its people, the times and history by wisely leading the party, the army and the people for many years, the letter noted.
					
					 It pointed out that he conducted energetic ideological and theoretical activities and external activities for the victory of the socialist cause, global peace and stability and friendship and solidarity among peoples under the uplifted banner of independence against imperialism and put the international status and prestige of the DPRK on the highest level and made an great and immortal contribution to the human cause of independence.
					
					 The great leaders had always taken warm care of the work and life of the Koreans in China just as their real parents would do and highly estimated and put forward them when they did something they should have done for the country and the nation, it said.
					
					 It noted that the General Association of Koreans in China and all Korean residents in China are filled with the firm will to bring about a fresh heyday of the movement of overseas compatriots without fail under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Lauded by Koreans in China
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Lauded by Koreans in China
 Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- With deep yearning, we are now honoring in humble reverence the memory of leader Kim Jong Il who performed undying feats to be recorded forever in the 5,000-year-long history of the nation.
					 Cha Sang Bo, vice-chairman of the General Association of Koreans in China who is heading the delegation of the General Association on a visit to the homeland to commemorate the 5th anniversary of Kim Jong Il's demise, said this in an interview with KCNA on Saturday.
					
					 He said:
					
					 Retrospectively, the whole life of Kim Jong Il was a sacred life of the father of the nation as he dedicated his all only to the prosperity of the country and the happiness of the people.
					
					 He continued a ceaseless journey for the people, going through even roads between high and rugged sharp-cut cliffs and despite biting midwinter cold and midsummer heat.
					
					 The history of mankind knows no such a popular leader as Kim Jong Il who based his political creed on the people-centered idea and the people-first principle and adhered to it as an unchangeable cornerstone.
					
					 His devoted efforts for the people under the motto of believing in the people as in Heaven can never be forgotten.
					
					 It is greatest fortune and blessing of the nation of the sun to have the great men of Mt. Paektu generation after generation.
					
					 The Korean residents in China will further strengthen the General Association, a patriotic legacy of the great leaders, into an overseas Koreans' organization of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Chinese Lauds Kim Jong Il as Tender-hearted Father
articles.content:
Chinese Lauds Kim Jong Il as Tender-hearted Father
 Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- Zhou Wei, daughter of Zhou Bao-zhong, Chinese related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, expressed her strong yearning for leader Kim Jong Il. She is visiting the DPRK on the occasion of the fifth anniversary of his demise. 
					 We have kept deeper in our hearts the image of tender-hearted Kim Jong Il as the appearance of the sun for the past five years, she said, adding:
					
					 At this moment when all people's reverence for him is becoming stronger, my family is praying for his immortality in the humblest reverence and look back with deep emotion on the history of his internationalist obligation.
					
					 He took warm care of the life of my family with the revolutionary sense of obligation, while setting store by the bloody relations forged between President Kim Il Sung and my father in the period of the anti-Japanese armed struggle.
					
					 Kim Jong Il took all steps so that we could spend a pleasant time at scenic spots of the DPRK and was also considerate about the future of my children. 
					
					 He showed all kinds of benevolence for not only my family but also all other families overseas related to the revolutionary activities of the President. 
					
					 General Kim Jong Il, tender-hearted father of all family members related to the revolutionary activities of the President and the supreme incarnation of warm love, will always be with us as the great sun. 
					
					 The history of the noble sense of internationalist obligation will be given steady continuity thanks to the respected Marshal Kim Jong Un, who is identical to the General who valued and put forward us so much.

articles.title: Great Feats Kim Jong Il Performed for National Reunification
articles.content:
Great Feats Kim Jong Il Performed for National Reunification
 Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- It has been five years since the demise of leader Kim Jong Il. On this occasion all Koreans in the north, the south and abroad are recalling the great devotion he made for achieving the national reunification.
					 He had conducted energetic ideological and theoretical activities to make public famous works like "Let Us Carry Out the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung's Instructions For National Reunification" and "Let Us Reunify the Country Independently and Peacefully Through the Great Unity of the Entire Nation" and thus formulated the three principles of national reunification, the ten-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo, which were advanced by President Kim Il Sung, into the three charters for national reunification.
					
					 He saw to it that the monument inscribed with Kim Il Sung's last signature on a document of national reunification was built at Panmunjom and the Monument to the Three Charters for National Reunification in Pyongyang.
					
					 He also ushered in the June 15 era of reunification for the first time in the history of national division to open up a broad prospect for the country's reunification.
					
					 He provided the historic north-south summits to adopt the June 15 joint declaration, the key spirit of which is "By our nation itself", and the October 4 declaration, a programme for implementing the declaration.
					
					 And he had built up an invincible military power, capable of defending the peace on the Korean peninsula and the security of the nation, to fully guarantee the peaceful reunification of the country.
					
					 Indeed, leader Kim Jong Il was the loadstar of national reunification who ushered in a new era of independent reunification and laid a firm foundation for it.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Ridicules Story about "North Collapse"
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Ridicules Story about "North Collapse"
 Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- Assertion is heard in the U.S. that Obama's policy toward the DPRK is a fiasco and it is a daydream to expect the DPRK's "collapse".
					 NK News carried an article titled "Time is now opportune for dropping a curtain on the story about 'North Korea's collapse'" on Dec. 8, drawing attention of the public.
					
					 The article said Park Geun Hye has been behind Obama's story about "collapse," noting "U.S. having more than 16 intelligence organs should admit it as its fiasco to have shaped its north Korea policy under the influence of such puppet-like woman as Park Geun Hye."
					
					 This is a serious reprimand at silly politicians of the U.S. who supported traitor Park's story about "collapse of north," which is no more than a divination sign made by a shaman.
					
					 The shaman lorded it over south Korean politics and made fun of famous politicians of other countries. Needless to say is the deplorable situation of the "world's only superpower" which lent an ear to the necromancer's ritual in shaping its policy.
					
					 The shaman's dreamily talk about "collapse of north" was parroted by Park and, being taken in by the garrulous woman's story of "collapse," Obama proposed the policy of "strategic patience."
					
					 The Obama regime helplessly waited for the DPRK to "collapse" only to feel frustration at its own vain attempt and to become a laughing stock of the world as a special political cartoon.
					
					 The international community's view and outlook on the DPRK has undergone a fundamental change today.
					
					 Professor of University of Leeds of Britain Foster Carter who used to assert that DPRK is in the danger of "collapse" in 2009 now said the changed situation made him change his mind, and he advised others to drop the dream.
					
					 There was a flurry of censure at the Obama administration's failed "Asia rebalancing policy" at a hearing at the International Relations Committee of the House of Representatives of the U.S. on Dec. 6.
					
					 This being a hard fact, there are still foolish politicians in the U.S. who are still unable to have a proper look at the strategic position of the DPRK. This is a tragedy.
					
					 Just look at the end met by the group of traitor Park who faced the fate of total bankruptcy while talking about "collapse."
					
					 Those who challenge the truth will only face collapse and those who spread the unrealistic story of "north's collapse" will certainly face the miserable fate of collapse.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Lauds Kim Jong Il as Great Master of World Politics
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Lauds Kim Jong Il as Great Master of World Politics
 Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- With the treasured sword of Songun, the DPRK still now confidently guides the struggle for victory in the human cause of independence, steering the complicated world political trend.
					 This would have been unthinkable without the great feats of leader Kim Jong Il, who had wisely led the struggle for the human cause of independence under the banner of independence against imperialism, says Rodong Sinmun in an article Saturday.
					
					 Lauding him as a distinguished, elder statesman who established a new world political structure with the DPRK in the center, the article goes on:
					
					 It became an unbelievable reality that the U.S., which used to bluff world domination, had to read the face of the DPRK, not a big country, and the world politics proceeded as was determined and willed by Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Kim Jong Il was the lodestar of the human cause of independence who guided the development of history to independence.
					
					 He authored such famous works as "Abuses of Socialism Are Intolerable" and "Socialism Is a Science" to instill hope and confidence into the world progressives aspiring after socialism and showed in practice with what one should defend independence.
					
					 The U.S. and other imperialist forces' every move for aggression and pressure were frustrated by the might of Songun.
					
					 After all, the world politics could not but trend towards independence against imperialism.
					
					 Kim Jong Il is, indeed, the peerlessly great master of politics as he saved the world from the dark tentacles of the imperialists and provided a beacon of hope for the progressives.

articles.title: Chongwadae's Inspection of Ministry of Justice Disclosed
articles.content:
Chongwadae's Inspection of Ministry of Justice Disclosed
 Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- Chongwadae's inspection of the Ministry of Justice was disclosed, according to CBS of south Korea on Dec. 15.
					 The former manager of Segye Ilbo at a "National Assembly" hearing that day said he had a document which said Chongwadae inspected the president of the Supreme Court, the broadcasting service noted.
					
					 It is something shocking that the Park Geun Hye regime kept track of the president of the Supreme Court just as the Lee Myung Bak regime did the then president of the Supreme Court and civilians.
					
					 This is nothing but a violation of "constitution" aimed to exercise influence on court judgments, it deplored.
					
					 It demanded that not only the NA but the special investigation make a thorough-going probe into the suspicious inspection.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime's Modification of Labor Law under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime's Modification of Labor Law under Fire
 Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- Lawmakers from the south Korean opposition Democratic Party and representatives of various bank trade unions under the Financial Trade Union of south Korea held a press conference outside the building of the "National Assembly" on December 13 in protest against the regime's modification of the labor law, according to a south Korean internet newspaper.
					 A press release was read out at the conference.
					
					 The press release termed the introduction of the system of paying salaries according to piece rate retrogressive modification of the labor law masterminded by Choe Sun Sil whose scandal shocked the public.
					
					 It was proven by the trade unions' general strike that the Park Geun Hye regime's attempt to revise the labor law w

articles.title: Bird Flu Spreads in S. Korea
articles.content:
Bird Flu Spreads in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- Bird flu occurred in south Kangwon Province of south Korea on Dec. 4 and then in a chicken farm in Cholwon County 600 meters far from the place of origin ten days after, according to the south Korean KBS.
					 Meanwhile, bird flu attacked a chicken farm in Pusan on Dec. 15.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Lauded by Russian Personages
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Lauded by Russian Personages
 Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- A seminar on the exploits of leader Kim Jong Il took place in Moscow on Dec. 13.
					 Its participants observed a moment's silence in memory of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 A report and speeches were made there.
					
					 V.A. Petrov, chairman of the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK who is chairman of the Russian Committee for Remembering the Great Leader Comrade Kim Jong Il, said that it is their duty to honor the memory of Kim Jong Il, the eternal leader of the Workers' Party of Korea and the closest friend of the Russian people.
					
					 He stressed that though Kim Jong Il passed away, he would remain forever in the minds of the world progressive people.
					
					 Nikolayev, secretary of the C.C., Communist Party of Soviet Union, said that Kim Jong Il is a great man as he proved the inevitability of victory of socialism through revolutionary practices in the hardest period when the imperialists got evermore pronounced in their moves to isolate and stifle the DPRK and thus inspired the peoples aspiring after socialism with a fresh conviction and courage.
					
					 Revedev, chief of the Russian Group for Solidarity with the DPRK, said that with his Songun politics, Kim Jong Il firmly defended the DPRK from the imperialists' moves for aggression and provided a strong foundation for building an economic power.
					
					 Zhukova, first vice-chairwoman of the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK, said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il worked heart and soul to develop the Russia-DPRK relations. He visited Russia several times in the new century.
					
					 The Russian people are deeply revering him.
					
					 A message to Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the DPRK, was adopted at the seminar.

articles.title: UNSC's "Sanctions Resolution" Rejected in Benin and Ukraine
articles.content:
UNSC's "Sanctions Resolution" Rejected in Benin and Ukraine
 Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- Beninese and Ukrainian personages issued statements on Dec. 5 and 6 as regards the fact that the UN Security Council adopted a "sanctions resolution" against the DPRK over its nuclear warhead explosion test.
					 Ali Houdou, president of the Socialist Party of Benin, said the recent "sanctions resolution", cooked up at the U.S. instigation, showed once again that the UNSC which should regard it as its mission to ensure sovereignty and right to existence of its member states has become a nominal body.
					
					 All member states of the UN, including non-aligned countries, ardently call for the prompt reform of the UNSC being abused by big powers as their political tool, he said, adding:
					
					 Now is the time for the U.S. to understand that its escalating sanctions caused the danger of reducing its mainland into a target of nuclear strike.
					
					 The chairperson of the Dnepropetrovsk Branch of the Ukrainian "Treasured Sword of Songun" Association for the Study of the Juche Idea said:
					
					 The adoption of unilateral and meaningless resolution only stirs shame at the dignified international body.
					
					 The U.S. and its followers' vicious moves compelled the DPRK to develop its own nuclear deterrence.
					
					 Those interested in peace and denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula should, first of all, strongly urge the U.S. to abandon its ambition for world domination, stop its annual war exercises on the peninsula, lift its mean sanctions on the DPRK and conclude a peace pact with the latter.

articles.title: Newspapers on Kim Jong Il's Career and Feats
articles.content:
Newspapers on Kim Jong Il's Career and Feats
 Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- Newspapers here today editorially laud the revolutionary career and feats of leader Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the fifth anniversary of his demise.
					 The past five years were an unforgettable period during which all the people keenly realized what precious feats leader Kim Jong Il performed for accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche, Rodong Sinmun says, adding: 
					
					 Regarding it as his lifelong mission to accomplish the revolutionary cause started in Mt. Paektu, Kim Jong Il saved the destiny of the revolution, the country and its people from the life-and-death crisis and brought about epoch-making miracles and changes in all fields of socialist construction with his original Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					 His revolutionary life as the peerlessly Songun brilliant commander was the noblest patriotic life as he provided foundations for the eternal prosperity of the great Paektusan nation by hewing the unimaginably rugged snow-covered road with his noble view on life and future that one should live not merely for today but for tomorrow and successfully carrying out the most important and difficult historic tasks in the building of a powerful socialist country.
					
					 He had made high-intensity forced march of field guidance day and night with his superhuman will and efforts to bring a bright future of the country and the nation while going in simple jumper till the last moments of his life.
					
					 His self-sacrificing patriotic dedication and revolutionary history make the hearts of all his soldiers and disciples burn with patriotic enthusiasm and revolutionary zeal.
					
					 Minju Joson says that his revolutionary career was that of an outstanding thinker and theoretician who brightly showed the road ahead of the times and the revolution and it was the life of a prominent statesman, great Songun brilliant commander and tender-hearted father of the people who performed undying feats to remain forever in the history of the country and the human history of politics.
					
					 History has recorded a large number of great persons for their contributions to their countries and nations but knows no such peerlessly great man as Kim Jong Il who is always alive in the hearts of the people, the paper notes, adding:
					
					 Kim Jong Il is the eternal image of the great Paektusan nation and his revolutionary history continues along with dynamism of the thriving country.

articles.title: Tiene lugar el acto central de recordacion de Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Tiene lugar el acto central de recordacion de Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, 17 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El dia 17, tuvo lugar con solemnidad en la explanada frente al Palacio del Sol Kumsusan el acto central de recordacion por el 5o aniversario de deceso del Dirigente Kim Jong Il. 
					Salio a la tribuna del acto Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea. 
					
					Asistieron Kim Yong Nam, Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae y otros cuadros directivos del Partido, el Estado y el ejercito, los miembros del organo de direccion central del Partido en esta capital, los funcionarios de los organismos del Partido, las fuerzas armadas y el poder, entidades sociales, ministerios y organos centrales, los oficiales y soldados del EPC y el Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, las instituciones, empresas, fabricas y granjas cooperativas de la capital, las personas que estan relacionadas con las actividades del Dirigente, las otras que fueron recibidas por el, los ameritados, los familiares de martires revolucionarios, los compatriotas residentes en ultramar y sus delegaciones y el representante de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang. 
					
					Tambien estuvieron presentes los representantes diplomaticos y de organizaciones internacionales, los miembros del Cuerpo de Agregados Militares, acreditados en Corea, y los huespedes extranjeros.
					
					Todos los participantes guardaron un momento de silencio en memoria del Dirigente, imagen y eterno lider de la potencia Paektusan.
					
					El discurso de la ocasion estuvo a cargo de Choe Ryong Hae, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y vicepresidente del Comite de Estado de la RPDC y del Comite Central del PTC. 
					
					El orador dijo que la vida revolucionaria del Dirigente Kim Jong Il fue la mas patriotica y abnegada del gran hombre quien en acato al noble proposito del Presidente Kim Il Sung, dedico todo lo suyo por el cumplimiento de la revolucion del Juche y la prosperidad de la potencia Paektusan allanando el camino inexplorado bajo la bandera roja de la revolucion, y continuo:
					
					Con absoluta fidelidad al Presidente, el Dirigente hizo todo lo posible para materializar su idea y causa.
					
					Formulo la idea revolucionaria del Presidente como el Kimilsungismo, establecio en todo el Partido y toda la sociedad el sistema de idea y direccion unicas de el, defendio con firmeza las tradiciones revolucionarias del Juche y consolido el Partido, el Estado y el ejercito como los del lider antecesor. 
					
					Hizo a todos los militares y civiles coreanos guardar en lo profundo del corazon la conviccion de que el Presidente vive para siempre en ellos y acondicionar el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan como lugar sagrado del Juche para que continuara eternamente la historia del gran Lider. 
					
					Fortalecio el Ejercito Popular de Corea como poderoso ejercito revolucionario del monte Paektu, y la industria de defensa nacional como la independiente y revolucionaria en el nivel sofisticado y convirtio asi la patria en la potencia militar de talla mundial y digna portadora de armas nucleares. 
					
					Gracias al Dirigente Kim Jong Il, se abrieron la era de reunificacion del 15 de Junio que marcha bajo el ideal de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales" y las buenas perspectivas para la reunificacion independiente, la paz y la prosperidad en el camino de nuestra nacion. 
					
					Con la destacada estratagema diplomatica y energicas actividades exteriores, elevo extraordinariamente la posicion y la influencia de la RPDC en la arena internacional, amplio y desarrollo las relaciones exteriores, defendio la paz y la seguridad del mundo e hizo aporte inmortal al cumplimiento de la causa de independencia de la humanidad. 
					
					Con su larga prevision, resolvio satisfactoriamente el problema de sucesion de la causa revolucionaria de acuerdo con la demanda de la epoca y la aspiracion del pueblo. 
					
					Seran eternas junto con la era de Kim Jong Un la vida revolucionaria y las imborrables hazanas de Kim Jong Il quien sento el firme fundamento para la victoria eterna de la potencia Paektusan y la prosperidad del pueblo coreano. 
					
					Luego, en representacion del PTC, el EPC y la juventud, pronunciaron discursos de juramento Kim Ki Nam, miembro del Buro Politico del CC del PTC y del Comite de Estado de la RPDC y vicepresidente del CC del PTC, el vicemariscal del EPC Hwang Pyong So, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del CC del PTC, vicepresidente del Comite de Estado de la RPDC y jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, y Jon Yong Nam, primer secretario del CC de la Union de la Juventud Kimilsungista-Kimjongilista.
					
					Los oradores dijeron que todos los militares y habitantes coreanos rinden el maximo tributo al Dirigente y desean su eternidad anorandole muchisimo. 
					
					Mencionaron que el dedico hasta el ultimo momento de su vida a sentar la firme base para el desarrollo del Partido, la prosperidad de la patria y la felicidad del pueblo y forjo el futuro maravilloso de la revolucion del Juche.
					
					Enfatizaron que sus proezas realizadas ante el Partido, la revolucion, la patria y el pueblo brillaran para siempre como bandera de lucha que continua el linaje del PTC y promueve la causa revolucionaria del Juche. 
					
					Manifestaron la decision de enaltecer al Dirigente como eterno Sol del Juche y apoyar con fidelidad la orientacion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					
					Acto seguido, se tiraron las salvas en memoria de Kim Jong Il. 
					
					Este dia, tuvieron lugar actos similares en todas las provincias, ciudades, distritos y complejos industriales.

articles.title: Cuadros directivos rinden homenaje a Kim Jong Il en el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan
articles.content:
Cuadros directivos rinden homenaje a Kim Jong Il en el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan
Pyongyang, 17 de diciembre (ACNC) -- En ocasion del 5o aniversario de fallecimiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, los cuadros directivos del partido, el Estado y el ejercito visitaron el 17, dia de recordacion mas grande de la nacion, el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan. 
					A las 9 de la manana, el Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Maximo Dirigente del Partido, el Estado y el ejercito, visito el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan.
					
					El entro en el hall donde se encuentran las estatuas de pie de los grandes Lideres Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il. 
					
					El jefe de la guardia de honor de las fuerzas terrestres, navales, aereas y antiaereas del EPC y del Ejercito Rojo Obrero-Campesino dio el parte de recepcion hacia las estatuas de pie.
					
					Seguidamente, fue depositado un cesto de flores en nombre del Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					
					Ademas, fueron colocados los cestos de flores en nombre comun del Comite Central y la Comision Militar Central del PTC y el Comite de Estado, el Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema y el Consejo de Ministros, de la RPDC.
					
					Junto con los participantes en la ceremonia de homenaje, Kim Jong Un rindio homenaje postumo a los grandes Lideres ante sus estatuas de pie y se dirigio al salon de eternidad donde esta conservado el cuerpo del Dirigente.
					
					Ahi volvio a rendirle tributo junto con los participantes.
					
					Los participantes recorrieron la sala de conservacion de las ordenes recibidas por el Dirigente
					
					Acompanaron al Mariscal en esta ocasion Kim Yong Nam, Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae y otros cuadros responsables del Partido, el Estado y el ejercito, los miembros del organo de direccion central del Partido en esta capital y los funcionarios de los organismos del Partido, las fuerzas armadas y el Poder, ministerios y organos centrales.

articles.title: Ofrecida funcion de epopeya musical "Camino del Songun del General"
articles.content:
Ofrecida funcion de epopeya musical "Camino del Songun del General" 
Pyongyang, 17 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 5o aniversario del fallecimiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, tuvo lugar el dia 17 en el Teatro de Arte Ponghwa la funcion de la epopeya musical "Camino del Songun del General". 
					Vieron la funcion Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae, miembros del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y otros cuadros directivos del Partido, el Estado y el ejercito, el presidente de partido amigo, los miembros del organo de direccion central del Partido en esta capital, los funcionarios de los organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas, ministerios, organos centrales y los funcionarios y ameritados de organos, fabricas y empresas en esta capital. 
					
					Fueron invitados las delegaciones de los coreanos residentes en ultramar y los compatriotas, los relacionados con la lucha revolucionaria antijaponesa, el representante de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang, los matrimonios de los representantes diplomaticos y de organizaciones internacionales y los de agregados militares, acreditados en Corea y otros extranjeros. 
					
					En la escena de la funcion iniciada con la narracion y musica "Decimos al General" se presentaron el solo femenino y pangchang masculino "Cuentalo, el camino del Songun" y el coro infantil "El General y los ninos" y otras diversas piezas. 
					
					Los ejecutantes elogiaron las proezas revolucionarias del Dirigente y transmitieron los esfuerzos abnegados de este lider quien estuvo siempre en el largo camino del Songun. 
					
					Tambien, pusieron las piezas que reflejan el sentimiento de agradecimiento del ejercito y pueblo coreanos al Dirigente y la voluntad de ellos de lograr la victoria final de la revolucion del Juche bajo la orientacion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Ejercito y pueblo coreanos recuerdan con reverencia a Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Ejercito y pueblo coreanos recuerdan con reverencia a Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, 17 de diciembre (ACNC) -- En ocasion del 5o aniversario de deceso del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, los militares y habitantes coreanos recordaron con reverencia al gran hombre sin igual quien dedico toda su vida por el partido, la revolucion, la patria y el pueblo. 
					Este dia de recordacion mas grande de la nacion, los oficiales y soldados del EPC, los trabajadores de diferentes estratos, los jovenes y ninos escolares visitaron la explanada frente al Palacio del Sol Kumsusan para rendir homenaje al Presidente Kim Il Sung y al Dirigente Kim Jong Il ante sus imagenes sonrientes. 
					
					Las ceremonias de homenaje tuvieron lugar tambien ante sus estatuas de bronce e imagenes sonrientes levantadas en distintas localidades del pais. 
					
					Se ofrecieron los conciertos de recordacion de los artistas, los jovenes y estudiantes y las integrantes de la Union Socialista de Mujeres de Corea en las provincias de Phyong-an del Sur, Hamgyong del Norte y Hamgyong del Sur, Ryanggang y la ciudad de Kaesong, etc. 
					
					Los ejecutantes elogiaron la historia y hazanas revolucionarias del Dirigente quien estuvo en el camino de abnegacion por la patria y el pueblo hasta el ultimo momento de su gran vida. 
					
					Tuvieron lugar en diferentes partes del pais los actos de recordacion de los jovenes y estudiantes, las personas recibidas por el Dirigente y las otras relacionadas con sus actividades. 
					
					Se efectuo en la provincia de Kangwon el encuentro de recordacion de tales personas quienes narraron los sucesos y anecdotas revolucionarias, registrados en el camino de orientacion en el terreno del gran Lider. 
					
					Por otra parte, las filiales de las organizaciones de masas a lo largo del pais sostuvieron actos de juramento.

articles.title: Coreanos guardan tres minutos de silencio en memoria de Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Coreanos guardan tres minutos de silencio en memoria de Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, 17 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Este dia del 5o aniversario de fallecimiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, todo el pais esta sumergido en el clima mas sublime.
					Estan izadas a media asta las banderas en el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan, donde estan conservados los cuerpos de los grandes Lideres Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il, los organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el poder, entidades sociales, ministerios, organos centrales, unidades del Ejercito Popular de Corea y del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, instituciones de ciencia, educacion, literatura y arte, salud publica, prensa e informacion, fabricas, empresas, granjas, aldeas pesqueras y las demas unidades de todo el pais. 
					
					A las 12 en punto, resonaron simultaneamente las sirenas en todas las ciudades, zonas rurales, fabricas, aldeas, locomotoras en operacion y barcos en navegacion. 
					
					Todos los militantes del Partido, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y los habitantes de todo el pais guardaron 3 minutos de silencio en memoria de Kim Jong Il dirigiendose hacia el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan, lugar sagrado del Juche.

articles.title: Huespedes extranjeros y compatriotas en ultramar visitan el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan
articles.content:
Huespedes extranjeros y compatriotas en ultramar visitan el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan
Pyongyang, 17 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 5o aniversario de fallecimiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, los representantes diplomaticos y de organizaciones internacionales y los agregados militares, acreditados en la RPDC, los familiares de las personas residentes en ultramar que estan relacionadas con las actividades del Dirigente, la delegacion de recordacion de los coreanos residentes en Japon, la de la Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en China y otros huespedes extranjeros y compatriotas en ultramar visitaron el dia 17 el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan.
					Los visitantes rindieron tributo a los grandes Lideres Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il ante sus estatuas de pie y se dirigieron al salon de eternidad donde esta conservado el cuerpo del Dirigente para rendirle tributo. 
					
					Luego, pasaron revista a las salas de conservacion de las ordenes que testimonian el gran respeto de la humanidad al Dirigente, el carro, el coche electrico, el barco y el vagon de tren, usados por el hasta el ultimo periodo de su vida para las visitas de orientacion en el terreno y el viaje al extranjero.
					
					El mismo dia, hicieron otro tanto el representante y otros miembros de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang.
